S0491: I love the way you try to help.
我喜欢你努力帮助的方式。
S0492: Which of those places do you think is the most interesting?
你觉得那些地方中哪个最有趣？
S0494: What happens after the first part of the show?
演出的第一部分之后会发生什么？
S0496: I'm not planning to lose when it really matters.
我不打算在真正重要的时候输。
S0497: That sounds as though you need to get some sleep.
听起来好像你需要睡一觉。
S0498: He's standing alone over there inside the entrance.
他一个人站在那边入口里面。
S0499: Maybe we should open the door and close the window.
也许我们应该开门关窗。
S0500: Why don't you want to sit between the two girls?
你为什么不想坐在两个女孩中间？
S0501: If only I could trust you to play together without arguing.
要是我能相信你们一起玩不吵架就好了。
S0502: She almost got lost because she turned left instead of right.
她差点迷路，因为她向左转而不是向右转。
S0503: I hate making trouble but that one's mine.
我讨厌制造麻烦，但那个是我的。
S0504: I'm going to run across the grass.
S0505: So that I don't get left behind.
S0506: I used to live around here years ago before we moved.
多年前我们搬家之前，我以前住在这附近。
S0508: There's no point worrying about how you're going to pay.
担心你将如何付钱没有意义。
S0509: I heard that you're going to pay for a new bed.
我听说你要买一张新床。
S0510: She's gone to look for somewhere safe to park the car.
她去找一个安全的地方停车了。
S0511: The news took several hours to reach everyone in the office.
这个消息花了几个小时才传到办公室的每个人。
S0512: Can you hold the door open while I fetch the keys?
我去拿钥匙的时候你能把门开着吗？
S0513: It hurts most when I move my head up and down.
当我上下移动头部时最疼。
S0514: I found the perfect house on the first day.
我第一天就找到了完美的房子。
S0515: On the first day of the new year.
S0516: They both came on their own.
他们两个都是自己来的。
S0517: But they left with each other.
S0518: I couldn't imagine myself having exactly the same problem.
我无法想象自己有完全相同的问题。
S0519: I haven't seen their new baby yet.
我还没见过他们的新宝宝。
S0520: It might have happened to the whole family.
这可能发生在整个家庭身上。
S0521: I'm afraid that you'll forget why we needed to stay here.
我担心你会忘记我们为什么需要留在这里。
S0522: Let's agree that it was stupid to tell the truth.
我们同意说实话是愚蠢的吧。
S0524: I'll call you back in three or four minutes.
我三四分钟后给你回电话。
S0525: To check if you've been able to finish.
S0526: I'm finding it hard to believe that you can't guess.
S0527: Guess who told me that funny story.
猜猜是谁告诉我那个有趣的故事。
S0528: I'm probably supposed to keep those things in another room.
我可能应该把那些东西放在另一个房间。
S0529: Can you all put your hands up?
S0531: It isn't true that anyone can win the game.
并非任何人都能赢得比赛是真的。
S0533: She won't listen to every word you say.
她不会听你说的每一个字。
S0534: Let's not go outside in this dreadful weather.
我们别在这糟糕的天气出去吧。
S0535: He made a promise that he wouldn't choose the wrong job.
他承诺不会选择错误的工作。
S0536: I used to think that being crazy was bad.
我以前认为疯狂是不好的。
S0538: I don't want to seem as though I don't care.
我不想显得好像我不在乎。
S0540: I don't mind if you want to leave without the car.
如果你想不开车离开，我不介意。
S0541: It's a good idea to try and breathe slowly.
试着慢慢呼吸是个好主意。
S0542: 每当你感到生气的时候。
S0544: Whoever said it would be difficult was absolutely right.
无论谁说这会很难，都是完全正确的。
S0545: It's your turn to take the clean clothes upstairs.
轮到你把干净的衣服拿上楼了。
S0546: The dog is dirty and wet.
S0547: Because he has been playing in the mud.
S0548: I am feeling sad at the moment.
S0549: Because I have got to be quiet.
S0552: The church at the other end of the village is ugly.
村子另一头的教堂很丑。
S0553: I think the small church is very ugly.
S0555: And I'm too tired to fetch a new one.
而且我太累了，拿不了新的。
S0556: They play music late at night.
S0557: I wish they wouldn't play such loud music.
我希望他们不要放这么大声的音乐。
S0559: Have you found the path through the wood?
你找到穿过树林的小路了吗？
S0560: It goes down to the beach
